title: 'SNL' Reimagines the U.S. Customs Welcome Video After Trump's Ban

organizations.name: u.s. customs welcome video after trump

text:
'SNL' Reimagines the U.S. Customs Welcome Video After Trump's Ban 
Hilarious/terrifying. Feb 5, 2017 What would a US customs video look like under President Trump's new (recently blocked) ban? SNL imagines a hastily recut customs welcome video where the Department of Homeland Security rattles off new extreme vetting procedures including questionnaires ("Are you Muslim, yes or no?"), stool stamped requests, and required hot dog eating. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below And that line between comedy and tragedy gets even more blurred. More from ELLE:
